main event: On April 19, 1963, observers in Natrona, Pennsylvania, sighted a bright white circular object in the sky for about 10 minutes before it suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on a clear night with numerous stars visible,The object moved from southeast to northwest and was about 8,000 ft high when first seen,Observers initially thought it might be a plane but noted it made no sound,The object reappeared on April 20, 1968, appearing brighter and moving differently than before,The report was evaluated and concluded that the object was likely Satellite ECHO 1, which is visible in the area.
witness description: military personnel who have seen many strange things in the sky
